rows.label: tlk45100121_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, did you know my mam's a Driver?
Not to mention a perfectionist. She
doesn't believe in losing.

rows.label: tlk45100121_02_msg0002
rows.name:
That's why she teaches me stuff in
case I become a Driver too someday.

rows.label: tlk45100121_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Like Driver Skills! Apparently
once you learn one, it
activates automatically.

rows.label: tlk45100121_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I guess it's like, your body
remembers the motions so well
you can move without thinking?

rows.label: tlk45100121_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Just between you and me, though... I
don't think I want to become a Driver.
Watching my mam, it looks so stressful.
